effect.Name: Arcus tangens
effect.description: Arcus tangens - (The effect comes from the Krita) It divides the bottom layer by the top layer. It then divides it by Pi. It then uses this in the arcus tangent function and multiplies it by two
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Arcus tangens (Background) Shader | 1.0 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Krita) - It divides the bottom layer by the top layer. It then divides it by Pi. It then uses this in the arcus tangent function and multiplies it by two

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This option allows you to specify whether the main texture should be included in the final blending.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility
